title: Interesting view of the devil
review: Al Pacino as the devil? It was made for him, he's really believable and you can imagine yourself not being able to say no to him. Good acting and crisp photography add to an already edgy atmosphere. Great surprises at the end too. Check it out!

title: Stands up to repeated viewings
review: I bought this film on DVD and watched it twice within 2 days, it was that good. I wasn't quite sure what to expect but I wasn't let down. The special effects are really cool and you can tell that a lot of effort has gone into making this picture. For me James Woods steals the show though.
